pages.md:
# IMAGE QUALITY SETTING (Movie Recording)

## PERIPHERAL LIGHT CORRECTION

Select **ON** to enable peripheral illumination correction during movie recording.

| Options |        |
|---------|--------|
| ON      | OFF    |

- If **ON** is selected when a lens that does not transmit data to the camera is attached, peripheral illumination will be adjusted according to the option selected for !Image Quality Setting Icon **IMAGE QUALITY SETTING** > !Movie Icon **MOUNT ADAPTER SETTING** > **PERIPHERAL ILLUMINATION CORRECTION** in the shooting menu (page 142).
- Select **OFF** if you notice banding in movies recorded using this option.

## MOUNT ADAPTOR SETTING

This item is also found in the photo menus (page 140). Changes to one apply to the other.
